description: Creates a workflow template. Workflows can be created only in the user's namespace. (The public namespace contains only entities.) The workflow can contain only entities in the specified namespace. The workflow is validated against the entities in the latest version of the user's namespace unless another namespace version is specified in the request.

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: The workflow DefinitionDocument. The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value. The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_params.name: language
nested_params.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

parameters.name: compatibleNamespaceVersion
parameters.description: The namespace version in which the workflow is to be created. If no value is specified, the latest version is used by default.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the workflow.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the workflow was created.
